title: Curse Code
overview: Ake, struggling with finances, lives with grandkids and Am. Krittiya shares a family curse tale, seeks Ake help due to his ancestral ties to rituals against it. Initially reluctant, Ake accepts for compensation. He starts the rituals and gets a golden box but witnesses misfortunes. Spirits appear, grandkids suffer, and Ake races to break the curse to save them.
